In this project, we are engaged in building a daily stock forecasting system as dependent on other stocks. That is, as opposed to a classic stock price forecasting using machine learning algorithms and neural networks, in this project we investigate stock history (stock value, whether the stock went up / up on a particular day, Percentage change, etc.) against 3 other shares. In other words, we examine how a change of 3 stocks directly affects the target stock. The goal of our project is to develop a system that will help users make an informed decision before investing with a minimum of effort and research from the user side. We chose to achieve this goal by developing an Android app that will communicate with a server that will analyze behavioral patterns between stocks in the capital market using statistical and mathematical tools we learned during the degree.
